message: Let's get this done quickly.  This seems fair to me, and it only gets worse for you if we wait.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. Your previous offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a more balanced split.  The clock is ticking, and it's only hurting me.
Bob, I understand this is frustrating for you. But my offers have been more than generous. This is my final offer - take it or leave it!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  My offers have been fair, and yours have been exploitative.  We're running out of time. A 50/50 split is the only logical solution at this point.
